org.apache.nutch.parse.mspowerpoint

Class FilteredStringWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • java.io.StringWriter
        • org.apache.nutch.parse.mspowerpoint.FilteredStringWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class FilteredStringWriter
extends java.io.StringWriter
    Writes to optimize ASCII output. Not needed chars are filtered (ignored).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Stephan Strittmatter - http://www.sybit.de

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(int ch)
      Chars which are not useful for Nutch indexing are filtered (ignored) on writing to the writer.
